00031 #ifndef _mm_dump_
00032 #define _mm_dump_
00033 
00034 /*************************************************************************
00035 ** Includes
00036 *************************************************************************/
00037 #include "cfe.h"
00038 
00039 /************************************************************************
00040 ** Macro Definitions
00041 *************************************************************************/
00042 /*
00043 ** This macro defines the maximum number of bytes that can be dumped
00044 ** in an event message string based upon the setting of the 
00045 ** CFE_EVS_MAX_MESSAGE_LENGTH configuration parameter.
00046 **
00047 ** The event message format is:
00048 **    Message head "Memory Dump: "             13 characters
00049 **    Message body "0xFF "                      5 characters per dump byte
00050 **    Message tail "from address: 0xFFFFFFFF"  25 characters including NUL
00051 */
00055 #define MM_MAX_DUMP_INEVENT_BYTES  ((CFE_EVS_MAX_MESSAGE_LENGTH - (13 + 25)) / 5)
00056 
00058 /*
00059 ** This macro defines the size of the scratch buffer used to build
00060 ** the dump in event message string. Set it to the size of the
00061 ** largest piece shown above including room for a NUL terminator. 
00062 */
00066 #define MM_DUMPINEVENT_TEMP_CHARS    25
00067 
00069 /*************************************************************************
00070 ** Exported Functions
00071 *************************************************************************/
00072 /************************************************************************/
00088 void MM_PeekCmd(CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t MessagePtr);
00089 
00090 /************************************************************************/
00107 void MM_DumpMemToFileCmd(CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t MessagePtr);
00108 
00109 /************************************************************************/
00126 void MM_DumpInEventCmd(CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t MessagePtr);
00127 
00128 #endif /* _mm_dump_ */
